content: **crochet slippers in snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops extra 0-407 **size** 5/6½ - 7½/9 10/12 us sizes 35/37 - 38/40 42/44 eu sizes foot length 22 - 25 - 28 cm 8¾ -9¾ -11 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 200-200-250 g color no 36 pale pink mix and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 reel color no 04 light rose *yardage does not include glitter as it is a thread * drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l/11 - or size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge accessory 1 glass bead crochet the slippers on hook size 8 mm / l/11 with 1 strand of eskimo and 1 strand of glitter uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=2866&cid=19
